title: SYN Flood malformed packets
extract: A ping of death (“POD”) attack involves the attacker sending multiple malformed or malicious pings to a computer. The maximum packet length of an IP packet (including header) is 65,535 bytes. ... This can overflow memory buffers allocated for the packet, causing denial of service for legitimate packets.
extract_html: A ping of death (“POD”) attack involves the attacker sending multiple malformed or malicious pings to a computer. The maximum packet length of an IP packet (including header) is 65,535 bytes. ... This can overflow memory buffers allocated for the packet, causing denial of service for legitimate packets.
